events.name: IWD Tashkent - Women Techmakers 2018
events.description:
‚Ä¢ What we'll do
We are proud to be hosting the 2018 International Women's Day Celebration, a women's tech conference. This event will highlight the stories of our growing female community of designers, developers, and technology entrepreneurs.

Event agenda will soon available to public on this page.

General Agenda is as following:

09:00 - 09:30 - Participants registration
09:30 ‚Äì 13:15 - CodeLab, workshop sessions
12:30 ‚Äì 13:30 - Lunch time - Pizza/Coffee/ Networking/Exhibition
13:30 ‚Äì 16:00 - Lectures
‚Ä¢ What to bring
- Laptop
- Notebook if you want to notes

‚Ä¢ Important to know
Event is free and open for women in tech, preferable over 18.

Selection priority is given to women who are working in tech and related industries, students in these fields.

Sign up here:

http://bit.ly/wtm18tashkent

–û—Ä–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä: –ù–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Ç–∏–≤ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏

O'zbek tilidagi e'lonni quyida o'qing
For the English version see below

üá∑üá∫–ü—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ–º –Ω–∞ –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–æ–π WTM meetup!

Women Techmakers - —ç—Ç–æ –≥–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–π Google, –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫—É –∂–µ–Ω—â–∏–Ω –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–∏—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π. –¶–µ–ª—å –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏–π, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑—É–µ–º—ã—Ö –≤–æ –≤—Å–µ–º –º–∏—Ä–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –≤ —É–º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –≥–µ–Ω–¥–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä—ã–≤–∞ –≤ —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ STEM.

–£—á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –∏ —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏ –Ω–∞ WTM –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –±—ã—Ç—å –∫–∞–∫ –∂–µ–Ω—â–∏–Ω—ã —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –º—É–∂—á–∏–Ω—ã, —Ç.–∫ –≤–∞–∂–Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∂–µ–Ω—â–∏–Ω –≤ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ STEM, –∞ –Ω–µ –∏–∑–æ–ª—è—Ü–∏—è –∂–µ–Ω—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞.

–¢–µ–º—ã –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–æ–≤ —ç—Ç–æ–π –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∏ –±—É–¥—É—Ç –∞–Ω–æ–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã –ø–æ–∑–∂–µ. –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã —Ö–æ—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–æ–º, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–π–¥–∏—Ç–µ –ø–æ —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ: https://goo.gl/forms/680FOmgVeAh6ZD1c2

–£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–µ. –ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –º–µ—Å—Ç –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–æ. –î–ª—è —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—è –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ –ø–æ–¥—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–¥–∏—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–µ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –æ—Ç–º–µ—Ç–∏–≤ "–ü–æ–π–¥—É" –Ω–∞ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–µ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è –Ω–∞ Facebook –∏ –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–π—Ç–µ Meetup.com –ø–æ —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ: https://www.meetup.com/ru-RU/GDG-Tashkent/events/255474471/

=======================================

üá∫üá∏Welcome to the next WTM meetup!

Women Techmakers - is a global project supported by Google. The aim of the project is to support women in STEM. The mission of events being held worldwide is to encourage diversity and involve more women in STEM.

Participant and speaker could be anyone regardless of gender. It is important to involve women in STEM and not to isolate women communities.

The topics will be announced soon. If you would like to be a speaker, please apply by the link: https://goo.gl/forms/680FOmgVeAh6ZD1c2

Participation is free of charge. The number of participants is limited. To participate, you must confirm your desire to participate by clicking "I will go" on the event page on Facebook and on Meetup.com at the link: https://www.meetup.com/ru-RU/GDG-Tashkent/events/255474471/

=======================================
üá∫üáøNavbatdagi WTM meetupiga hush kelibsiz!

Women Techmakers ‚Äì bu Google hamkorligidagi ayol mutaxassislarni yuqori texnologiyalar yo‚Äònalishida qo‚Äòllab-quvvatlaydigan xalqaro dastur. Dasturning maqsadi ayollar va erkaklar darajasini STEM sohasida tenglashtirish.

WTM qatnashuvchilar va ma'ruzachilari ayollar bilan bir qatorda erkaklar ham bo'lishi mumkin. Chunki maqsad ‚Äî ayollar jamiyatini texnologiya sohasiga integratsiyasini qo'llab quvatlashdir.

Ma'ruza mavzulari keyinroq e'lon qilinadi. Agar siz o'z ma'ruzangiz bilan chiqishni xohlasangiz, quyidagi link orqali o'z arizangizni qoldiring: https://goo.gl/forms/680FOmgVeAh6ZD1c2

Qatnashish bepul. Joylar chegaralangan. Qatnashish uchun o'zingizni Facebookdagi mazkur tadbir va Meetup.com dagi tadbir sahifasida o'zingizni bormoqchilingizni belgilang: https://www.meetup.com/ru-RU/GDG-Tashkent/events/255474471/

events.name: GDG Tashkent Cloud Study Jam
events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don‚Äôt forget your charger.

Sign ups are closed! If you haven't received confirmation email, you can not participate in the event

events.name: Google Cloud Study Jam - GCP Essentials [Registration required]
events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Google Cloud Essentials.

Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don‚Äôt forget your charger.

Registration required: http://bit.ly/csj-registration
After you sign up, you will need to receive a confirmation letter of your registration since seats are limited

events.name: Woman Techmakers Tashkent IWD [Registration required]
events.description:
Come join us at Women Techmakers 2019 Tashkent!

Google's Women Techmakers program provides visibility, community, and resources for women in technology. If you'd like to learn more about WTM, feel free to visit https://www.womentechmakers.com. If you're not already a member, be sure to sign up on the membership page!

We're marking the event with some light food and beverages, networking time, an introductory talk, and a panel of women in tech that will be there to share their experiences. We look forward to seeing you there!

What we will have:

- CodeLab, workshop sessions
- Lunch time - Pizza/Coffee/ Networking/Exhibition
- Lectures
- Motivational session with Women in Tech

Event agenda will soon available to public on this page.

Agenda:
http://bit.ly/wtm2019agenda

‚Ä¢ Important to know
Event is free and open for women in tech, preferable over 16.

All participants are required to sign up and need to receive confirmation letter to participate. Registration link: https://forms.gle/g2kSAgJcd7VXFcTf8

events.name: Google I/O Extended Watching Party  [Registration required]
events.description:
Tuesday, the 7th of May, Google will stream the Keynote from their annual Google I/O Conference. This is THE biggest event for developers working with Google technologies and we get to hear about what's new and upcoming for the coming year.

C-Space in partnership with Google Developer Group Tashkent wish to provide you with the chance of seeing the keynote in a nice setting with other like-minded nerds ‚Äì hopefully creating an exciting environment and good discussion in Tashkent for this Google I/O Extended event.

The event starts at 18:30 so please be in good time in order to get the good seats, get some Google swag and network before the keynote.

At the event, we will provide free food, snacks and drinks throughout the evening. The Keynote itself will be streamed on a large screen.

We hope to see you for an entertaining and exciting evening full of surprises and announcements from Google.

Register now at bit.ly/wanna-io-party and wait for confirmation mail!

P.S. Due to limited number of seats, registration does not guarantee you tickets

Hope to See you there!

events.name: Kotlin / Everywhere Tashkent
events.description:
Kotlin/Everywhere, a series of community-driven events focussing on the potential of Kotlin on all platforms. We are aiming to help learn the essentials and best practices of using Kotlin everywhere, be it for Android, back-end, front-end and other platforms.

Learn more about the Kotlin and the practises of applying it in your projects in Kotlin/Everywhere Tashkent!

Registration is required to attend the event!

Registration link:
https://forms.gle/1bjkgXYRBS9t4Gyn6

events.name: AMA with Aziz Murtazaev [Registration required]
events.description:
GDG Tashkent is excited to bring Aziz Murtazaev - Software Engineer at Facebook UK for AMA (Ask Me Anything) meetup.
Aziz Murtazaev worked on a few products at Facebook before switching to UI infra.
Worked on various aspects of Litho framework (https://fblitho.com/) for the past 2.5 years and currently focusing on benchmarks on Litho components.

Venue: Platforma / C-Space (https://goo.gl/maps/2GCchPAGwNBKVRaD7)
Date & Time: October 11, 15:00
Entrance is free of charge
Registration is a MUST through https://forms.gle/DdzodgzKorRQQeAQ9

Due to a limited number of seats, we will send a confirmation for selected participants by 9:00 am October 11.

events.name: GDG DevFest 2019
events.description:
GDG DevFest Tashkent is coming soon for the second time! It brings together experts in Android, Web and Cloud technologies to Tashkent.

Learn the latest in web, mobile, cloud, machine learning, assistant and more at Uzbekistan's community-organized free conference.

- cloud and machine learning
- web
- mobile
- assistant
- codelabs
- demos

To find out more about speakers, topics and agenda, visit https://gdgtashkent.co/

Links:
Twitter page: https://twitter.com/gdgtashkent
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/gdgtashkent/

events.name: International Women's day (IWD) Tashkent 2020
events.description:
Come join us at Women Techmakers Tashkent 2020!

Google's Women Techmakers program provides visibility, community, and resources for women in technology. If you'd like to learn more about WTM, feel free to visit https://www.womentechmakers.com. If you're not already a member, be sure to sign up on the membership page!

We're marking the event with some light food and beverages, networking time, an introductory talk, and a panel of women in tech that will be there to share their experiences. We look forward to seeing you there!

Event agenda will soon available to public on this page.

events.name: Working from home: Tips and Tricks during quarantine
events.description:
First online meetup by GDG Tashkent! üí•

Tomorrow, on April 23rd, we will hold our first ever online meetup.

We are going to have a panel discussion with developers from Uzbekistan on the topic of working from home during quarantine!

Our invited guests are:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Sirojiddin Komolov - Android/Web developer and researcher
2Ô∏è‚É£ Alisher Ergashev - Freelance Software Developer
3Ô∏è‚É£ Nuruddin Iminokhunov - Product Manager at Super Dispatch

We will live stream the meetup on our YouTube channel. Join us at 8 p.m.!

üìå Date: April 23 (Thursday)
üìå Time: 20:00
üìå Platform: YouTube (Live Streaming)
üìå Language: Uzbek

Follow GDG Tashkent on YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEPvlcWSQJ-lsv-7v20mFBQ

@gdgtashkent

upcoming.name: GDG DevFest '20 Tashkent
upcoming.description:
Third GDG DevFest in a row is coming to Tashkent!

The last two were the biggest DevFests in Central Asia and thousands of participants learned the latest trends in web, mobile, cloud, machine learning, assistant and many other spheres!

Join us this year on October 24, 2020, at the biggest community-organized free conference in Tashkent!

The venue, as well as the agenda, are to be announced later.

organizers.name: Dostonkhon O.
organizers.bio: Hey! I am Dostonkhon, UX/UI designer at BILLZ and a senior student studying Computer Science & Software Engineering at Inha University in Tashkent. My field of interest includes UX/UI design, ML (CV) and HCI.
